mapper.select: select project_id, project_name, project_type, project_class, project_start_date, project_end_date, organization_id, client_id, project_manager, project_leader, note, sales, version_no from project where project_id = #{projectId} for update
select organization_id, organization_name, upper_organization from organization where organization_id = #{organizationId}

select project_work_id, project_id, project_name, project_type, project_class, project_start_date, project_end_date, organization_id, client_id, project_manager, project_leader, note, sales from project_work order by project_work_id
mapper.update: update project set project_name = #{projectName}, project_type = #{projectType}, project_class = #{projectClass}, project_start_date = #{projectStartDate}, project_end_date = #{projectEndDate}, organization_id = #{organizationId}, client_id = #{clientId}, project_manager = #{projectManager}, project_leader = #{projectLeader}, note = #{note}, sales = #{sales}, version_no = version_no + 1 where project_id = #{projectId}
mapper.insert: insert into project ( project_name, project_type, project_class, project_start_date, project_end_date, organization_id, client_id, project_manager, project_leader, note, sales, version_no ) values ( #{projectName}, #{projectType}, #{projectClass}, #{projectStartDate}, #{projectEndDate}, #{organizationId}, #{clientId}, #{projectManager}, #{projectLeader}, #{note}, #{sales}, #{versionNo} )
